ACTION BASEBALL LEAGUE
ALL TRANSACTIONS
12/31/1974
BNN Index | ABL | SCORES | STANDINGS | STATS | TEAMS | PLAYERS | TRANSACTIONS | HISTORY
 
Tuesday, December 31st , 1974
Cincinnati Cougars: Signed free agent RP Jose Medina to a 1-year contract worth a total of $42,000.
Cincinnati Cougars: RP Jonathan Slagle was designated for assignment, placed on waivers and taken off the secondary (40-man) roster.
New York Aces: Signed international amateur SP Luis Castro out of Dominican Republic to a minor league contract.

The Charlotte Colonels traded 29-year old LHP Anthony Jackson and 22-year old minor league 2B Matt Wolfe to the Minneapolis Blizzard, getting 22-year old C Cody Larkin, 20-year old minor league CF Victor Ramos, and 21-year old minor league CF Dante Neira in return.
